html:
We wanted to pause and wish our fantastic community a happy, healthy and safe holiday season. We are always grateful to you for contributing to the forums, correcting our mistakes (mostly mine), and making this site better.

We have seen quite a few changes this year here at CanonRumors (some changes are crazier than others), and we are looking forward to more exciting changes coming in the new year.

    I would be remiss if I didn’t mention our forum moderators. A special thank you to our tireless mods who keep the forums sane. So special wishes and thanks to Alan (AlanF), Brant (docsmith), John (neuroanatomist), Brant (DocSmith), and Ed (Mt Spokane Photography – Get well soon!).

    I hope everyone’s photographic dreams come true this holiday season and into 2025.

    So, from us here at CanonRumors, Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays!

    – Craig (Founder) & Richard (Editor and General Pain in the Ass to R100’s everywhere)

    Photo by Toni Cuenca on Unsplash

    When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
